resources.string: Can not access without a internet connection.

Dirty Unicorns was started at the end of 2012 by Alex Cruz. At the time he never imagined to see the success this project has today.

The project was created out of pressure by users of Alex Cruz's unofficial builds. At the time Alex was compiling unofficial AOKP builds for the EVO 3D and occasionally would include a mod or two not offered by the AOKP crew in his builds. Over time users found themselves divided. Some loved what Alex was doing while others were upset that they no longer had 'pure' AOKP builds. They pressured Alex to either go back to 'pure' AOKP builds or change the name.

Alex approached some close friends and they discussed what was happening in his thread and so 'pure' AOKP builds were dropped. With the help of close friends like Bret Zamzow, James Taylor, Josh Chasky, Barry Smith and a few others it began!

After using AOKP for a few cycles in kitkat, we decided that although we had learned a lot for first timers that we could do much more. We wanted a more AOSP oriented ROM base rather than one that was a mix of CAF and AOSP and loaded with features. We wanted a blank page or at least one that didn't have a lot of writing on it.

We moved on to OmniROM and it was great! Omni had only a few features on top of AOSP and we saw this as a great thing. We did a lot of great things and truly started to learn the framework. We used Omni for lollipop but we wanted more. Like with AOKP we had learned a lot and felt like could do more with 'pure' AOSP.

Since then we've been AOSP based with a hybrid CAF branch for certain devices.
